messages.subject: Waving hello:)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! I just joined the group.  We are in CO, and have one 2 1/2 year old little guy that we have started thinking about schooling for.  The more I read
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone!
I just joined the group. We are in CO, and have one 2 1/2 year old little guy that we
have started thinking about schooling for. The more I read about HSing, and
specifically unschooling, the more excited I get about the journey that awaits us! I've
been devouring all of the books I can, and spending lots of time on the web. I'm
happy to have found this group, and look forward to learning lots from all of you.

I'd love to connect with some local unschoolers, so if you are in or around the
Boulder/Denver area, please let me know!

Thanks!
Michelle
